title: Jeb: 1.8将加入锁箱子功能
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
Abdulla ‏@AbdullaAlN
Jeb，比起装mod，我更希望能够在原版的服务器中给箱子、炉子等加上上锁和保护的功能。谢谢（@jeb_I really wish there was a way to lock and protect chests, furnaces, ect from other players on a server.. Instead of a mod. Thnx though）

Jens Bergensten ‏ @jeb_
好的，这个功能将在1.8中被实现（@AbdullaAlNYes, that functionality will be included in 1.8 ）
